summary: the prevalence of HPyV6 was 1.7 % (15/887) children 5 years of age accounted for 80 % (12/15) of cases. all 15 HPyV6-positive patients were coinfected with other respiratory viruses. influenza virus A (IFVA) (8/15, 53.3 %) and respiratory syncytial virus (7/15, 46.7 %) were most common. to authorized users.
